name: 7.10 "Bar Wars II...." Online Trivia | 'Cheers'- Season 7 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was the gang at Cheers trying to win?
questions.explanation:
Bloody Mary Contest.

	The Bloody Mary Contest was held every year. Incidentally, the real Cheers in Boston (aka The Bull and Finch Pub) is known for their Bloody Mary.

questions.text: Who had to taste test the drink?
questions.explanation:
Norm.

	Norm was getting tired of having to keep tasting the Bloody Mary. However, Sam said they would do it until it was perfect because he didn't want to lose to Gary again.

questions.text: What instruction did Sam give Carla?
questions.correct: "Look for the shop with the dead duck in the window"
options: "Ask for Joanne she's the most helpful"
"Go to the third store on the right"
"Buy a black cat and give it to Gary for bad luck"
questions.explanation:
"Look for the shop with the dead duck in the window".

	Carla said that every store had a dead duck in the window. He had sent her to Chinatown.

questions.text: Who got Gary's top secret mix?
questions.explanation:
Rebecca.

	Rebecca got it because when she twirled around they all laughed and she grabbed it. Rebecca told them the point was she did get it.

questions.text: Where did Frasier say Lilith was?
questions.explanation:
Albany.

	Albany is the capital of New York. She was at a seminar on gender stereotypes.

questions.text: How could Woody tell Sam was mad?
questions.explanation:
Sam said he was mad.

	Sam then said, "Now I'm really mad." Woody replied, "Yeah I can tell."

stupid.

	Woody got really upset and told the gang at Cheers that he was sick of being called stupid. He said one more person used the word and he'd quit. Sam said, "Don't be stupid" so Woody quit.

questions.text: What did Woody forget to give Gary?
questions.correct: a note about the time schedule change
options: the cardamom for the Bloody Mary
questions.explanation:
a note about the time schedule change.

	Woody and the others at Cheers set this all up. Woody didn't really quit Cheers, he only acted like he did to work at Gary's. He purposely forgot to give Gary the note so he would miss the contest.

questions.text: How much did Carla pay the second "judge"?
questions.explanation:
$50.

	Carla said that this wasn't the real judge either but her next-door neighbor. She said she had planned it since they lost last years contest.

questions.text: Did Gary figure out the second judge was fake?
questions.explanation:
no.

	When he came into the bar again they thought he figured it out. It turned out all he wanted was his wallet that Carla had stolen from him.
